title: Finn B70 Straw Blower Dominic's Equipment Rental

tasks.task: Ride a farm vehicle to apply chemicals
subtasks: Start the farm vehicle
Drive the vehicle to the field
Apply chemical solution to the crops using the vehicle's sprayer
Ensure even coverage of the chemical solution
Check on workers' progress
Instruct workers on proper pesticide application techniques
Oversee application of chemicals to crops
Ensure all safety protocols are followed

tasks.task: Walk through the field to inspect crops
subtasks: Observe the growth and health of the crops
Check for any signs of pests or diseases
Note areas that may require additional treatment
Decide on chemical application based on weather forecasts
Delay or reschedule applications if rain is anticipated
Monitor rain sensors or crops' reaction to rain
Wash applicator nozzles after use
Disassemble equipment for deep cleaning
Lubricate moving parts to prevent damage

tasks.task: Attend to the health of livestock
subtasks: Check the farm animals for signs of illness
Provide necessary medications or treatments
Ensure proper feeding and water supply
